# Ignore node_modules folder if you decide to use npm (not required for this project yet)
node_modules/

# Ignore any build or dependency directories
build/
dist/

# Ignore logs and debugging files
*.log
*.debug

# Ignore macOS-specific files
.DS_Store

# Ignore editor-specific files (if using VSCode or other text editors)
.vscode/
.idea/

# Ignore any temporary files generated by the editor
*.swp
*.swo
*.bak

# Ignore package-lock.json or yarn.lock if you plan to use a package manager (optional)
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
